Keywords: Fantastic Four , Mystical , S.H.I.E.L.D.
Real Name: Robbie Reyes
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Hindering
GHOST OF UNCLE ELI: If Ghost Rider is 40 points, he is KO'd when his dial clicks past the red KO line. Protected: Pulse Wave.
FOUR S.H.I.E.L.D. BEAST HUNTERS: When Ghost Rider is given a MOVE action, after resolutions remove an action token from him and he can use Stealth until your next turn.
